how we make the basic earth sound these
are your upper and lower teeth there's a
bump behind your upper teeth and this is
the roof of your mouth you need to use
your voice you need to round your lips
just a little and your tongue will look
something like that with the front part
raised towards the bump but not touching
the center a little down and the back
part pulled into a tight ball the sides
of your tongue are up just enough to
touch the sides of your upper teeth
they're not pushing but they're touching

how you make the basic sound curve and

this

sound with our there's a gentle rounding
of the lips but you hold that position
until you get to the next sound run with
W there's movement of the lips one one I
pull it into a tight oh and then I
release so with our you focus more on
what's happening with your tongue with W
